name: Smart Text Field
description:
👆🏻Try the component in the interactive demo above


**UPDATES - Updated style tokens and minor bug-fixes


Smart components are here to supercharge your work-flow and allow you to design & prototype life-like interactions in figma at super fast speeds 🚀


Smart text-field is a smart component with built-in states, interactions, add-ons & sizes and easily adapts to any context in moments (literally!). It's completely responsive too. Customise with your styles and make it your own in moments!


Features included >


Variants >

  • default
  • error
  • valid
  • disabled

Interactions >

  • inactive
  • floating label (🌟animation built-in)
  • hover (🌟animation built-in)
  • focused (🌟animation built-in)
  • with-input (🌟animation built-in)
  • filled

Add-ons >

  • prefix text
  • assistive text
  • placeholder text
  • trailing icon/button

Sizes >

  • dense (field height - 40dp)
  • regular (field height - 44dp)
  • large (field height - 48dp)
  • text-area (field height - set manually)


Design note >

  • Designed and organised to save your time & efforts in creating high-fidelity interactive prototypes of your designs
  • Designed for everyday project use. ‘How-to’ notes have been included
  • Easily customisable with your styles. Design tokens for color, type, space are included. Simply override atoms with the styles of your library to make it your own (in moments!)
  • Component specs and interactions are based on Material Design. You can refer material.io for component documentation too.
  • Built using frames, auto-layout containers and interactive variants in figma
  • Built using atomic design techniques


Do share feedback if this helps your work flow or not


Happy designing!
